segments.advisor_message: So, uh, tell me about, like, your job, right? Like, what do you do for a living? You know, any, uh, expensesss you kinda have that are tied to that?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, right! So I work at the marketing firm, um, and like, I have expenses, you know, for that. So, uh, my salary is, like, around 50k per year, but there’s, um, travel costs, right? Like, they’re sorta about, I dunno, two hundred a month?  It’s essential though, 'cause I gotta meet clients!

segments.advisor_message: Uh-huh, right, so travel is, like, pretty important, yeah? Any other expenses we should chat about, maybe?
segments.client_message: Yeah, there's also, um, this software subscription, it’s like, uh, $20 a month, right? It’s just for work stuff, you know? I gotta keep track of those things. Don't wanna miss any deadlines, haha!
